mapper.insert: INSERT INTO advert(advert_name, content, img, createtime) VALUES (#{avatar.advertName}, #{avatar.content}, #{avatar.img}, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE advert SET advert_name = #{Advert.advertName}, content = #{Advert.content}, img = #{Advert.img}, sort = #{Advert.sort}, updatetime = NOW() WHERE id = #{Advert.id};
mapper.select: SELECT id, advert_name, content, img, sort, status, createtime, updatetime FROM Advert WHERE advert_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR img LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR sort LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR status LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR createtime LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR updatetime LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
